strategy: Craftworld Iyanden armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans, Knights and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: v1.0.0: The EA-R Iyanden Craftworld list owes its basic structure to the NetEA version on the list, with a number important changes and additions, most of which have been inherited from the process of making the 'main' EA-R Craftworld Eldar list: Biel-Tan. With the Wraithguard being reduced to 3+ save, Wraithblades got the same save. These units no longer being 4++ and Fearless allowed for making their formations somewhat cheaper.
The Iyanden list has also gained access to a Wraithknight formation, using the 'Knight' H-AV unit type.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Iyanden Warhosts
sections.description: Up to one Spirit Walker Warhost for each Spirit Guard or Spirit Blade Warhost

formations.name: Spirit Guard
extraUnits: Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

formations.name: Spirit Blades
extraUnits: Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

sections.name: Iyanden Troupes
sections.description: Up to two for each Iyanden Warhost taken

formations.name: Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer unit and seven Guardians
extraUnits: Heavy Weapons, Support Weapons, Wraithguard, Wraithblades, Wraithlord.
Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders
extraUnits: Add three Wave Serpents: 100 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

formations.name: Engines of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add one or two additional Engine of Vaul for 200 points each, chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

formations.name: Falcon Troupe
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free
Add five Guardians to the formation: 75 points

formations.name: Ranger Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to one Eldar Ranger for 25 points

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two War Walkers for 25 points each

sections.name: Iyanden Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Iyanden Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Wraithseer
items.description: Replace one Spiritseer character with an Wraithseer

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Exarch character to an Eldar Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Vypers
items.description: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbikes with Eldar Vypers
